name: Michael Fleming
content: Michael W. Fleming's Web Page Michael W. Fleming Professor Links: Faculty of Computer Science UNB home page Address: Michael W. Fleming Faculty of Computer Science University of New Brunswick P.O. Box 4400 Fredericton, NB E3B 5A3 Office:ITD-420 E-mail:mwf [at] unb.ca Teaching In 2025-2026, I am teaching: CS1203: Overview of Computer Science (Fall 2025) CS1303: Discrete Structures (Fall 2025) CS2333: Computability and Formal Languages (Winter 2026) Graduate supervision Note to prospective graduate students: I will not be accepting any additional graduate students in 2025-2026. Research Interests Artificial intelligence Preference elicitation Decision theory User modeling and adaptive systems Intelligent agents and multi-agent systems Human-computer interaction Academic Background B.Sc. (Mount Allison) M.Math. (University of Waterloo) Ph.D. (University of Waterloo)
